meanings.definition: A green-skinned fruit that is typically cooked as a vegetable.
meanings.sent1: I sliced the courgette for the salad.
meanings.sent2: The courgette was delicious in the stir-fry.
meanings.sent3: Why did the courgette go to the dance? To have a 'squash'ing good time!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a freshly picked courgette.
meanings.sent5: The courgette added a pop of color to the dish.

meanings.definition: A small cylindrical vegetable of the gourd family, usually dark green.
meanings.sent1: The courgette grew in our garden this summer.
meanings.sent2: She sautéed the courgette with garlic and herbs.
meanings.sent3: The courgette rolled off the counter and onto the floor, trying to escape its fate.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a courgette patch, full of ideas waiting to be harvested.
meanings.sent5: The chef carefully selected the freshest courgette for the dish.
